title: DEFINITELY NOT HECARIM - A friendly reminder to Rito
body:
With Halloween on the horizon I believe that Riot should give this skin some consideration. I mean c'mon, its two guys in a horse costume.

EDIT: Plz make sure his legs move completely uncoordinated, not like a horse.

replies.body:
For extra hilarity, he could be holding his weapon (not really sure of what kind of weapon would fit the theme of the skin) in his mouth. It would look so amazingly derpy.

I edited the comment a little for clarity.
I believe it's either a warglaive or a halberd.
I think he means the weapon specific to this skin. I think it could be a butcher knife taped to a cardboard tube.
And he just makes his neck go limp and whirls his head around each time he Q's.  I love it.
This skin would make me question whether I would prefer Arcade or Definitely not Hecarim. That's saying a lot.

First we need the Dunkey Hecarim skin.
But this is cool too.

Eh. Scary skins would be kinda lame. You can't really fit much scariness into a splash art and a small model. But you can fit a whole lot of silly into it.
